about_the_game:
A jam-packed, cooking-themed RPG about winning a galaxy-wide cooking tournament…
for aliens!

You’re whisked away to compete in Galactic Diner, the universe’s most popular TV show. Serve customers, explore an alien world, meet new friends, and cook everything from pancakes to dumplings as you fight your way to the top!

...But will it REALLY be that easy?

🌶️ Cook your way to the top!

It’s just a normal reality TV cooking show… or is it? Work with unlikely new friends to defeat NovaCorp and save the galaxy!

🍳 Delicious minigame madness

Master over 50 unique cooking-themed minigames. Cook in levels themed for everything from beaches to hot pots as you fight for your life against the galaxy's best chefs!

🍹 Explore a jam-packed alien world

The Galactic Resort is HUGE! Square off in the Arcade, relax in the Hot Springs, and enjoy the Food Court -- or dive into the underground tunnels and see what you find...

🍈 Eat everything in sight

Sample over 100 different foods and wares from around the galaxy. The more you try, the more of the Resort you can explore! Go gourmet!

🍕Hang out with the homies

From hot-headed chef Scorpion to the cool-as-a-cucumber Tomato, you’ve got a lot of fans.

Get to know ghosts, pop idols, top chefs, and other guests with their own secrets to discover. Run a steakhouse, thwart the space mafia, and much more!

A jam-packed, cooking-themed RPG about winning a galaxy-wide cooking tournament…
for aliens!

You’re whisked away to compete in Galactic Diner, the universe’s most popular TV show. Serve customers, explore an alien world, meet new friends, and cook everything from pancakes to dumplings as you fight your way to the top!

...But will it REALLY be that easy?

🌶️ Cook your way to the top!

It’s just a normal reality TV cooking show… or is it? Work with unlikely new friends to defeat NovaCorp and save the galaxy!

🍳 Delicious minigame madness

Master over 50 unique cooking-themed minigames. Cook in levels themed for everything from beaches to hot pots as you fight for your life against the galaxy's best chefs!

🍹 Explore a jam-packed alien world

The Galactic Resort is HUGE! Square off in the Arcade, relax in the Hot Springs, and enjoy the Food Court -- or dive into the underground tunnels and see what you find...

🍈 Eat everything in sight

Sample over 100 different foods and wares from around the galaxy. The more you try, the more of the Resort you can explore! Go gourmet!

🍕Hang out with the homies

From hot-headed chef Scorpion to the cool-as-a-cucumber Tomato, you’ve got a lot of fans.

Get to know ghosts, pop idols, top chefs, and other guests with their own secrets to discover. Run a steakhouse, thwart the space mafia, and much more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570 (4096 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Galactic Diner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Galactic Diner is a cooking-themed RPG full of minigame mayhem. Explore a planet full of friends, food, and mysteries, and cook your way to the top of the galaxy!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
